casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Antwaun SIMS 297PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 21, 2018

David W. Andrews, Assistant Appellate Defender, Ben Finholt, Attorney at Law, For Sims, Antwaun Kyral

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender

Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, Ernie Lee, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 20th of December 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of December 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 5th day of February 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
